title: Account locked after region transfer..?
body:
Im moving countries due to schooling, and i transferred my main from EUNE to NA. When i try logging on NA servers, it says my password is incorrect. But, when I log on EUNE servers, it says my accounts in the process of transferring. I cant log on my main, please help. I submit a ticket as well..

This issue happened within the hour i transferred to NA.

replies.body: Is the account the same one you're posting from?  I'm curious because you're able to login here to the boards but not the account.  Let me know your ticket number, and I'll check on the status!

Hi Porocles,
Thank you for replying to my post. No, it isn't the same account as this one. My main account (locked?), for some odd reason, when logging on to the EUNE servers says im transferring, but in the NA servers says the password is incorrect. The ticket number is #30428358. I never logged on anywhere but the league of legends client with the account information. I've received a response from another player support, but I still haven't heard anything about what has happened.

for the record* 
My loggin username is different for that account on the NA servers than EUNE, and I don't think the NA loggin is synced with my email (?). I do however have access to the original email account that I used when creating the account.
